name: OCKAdherence
desc: A set of cases that indicate a patient's progress at completing tasks.

items.name: case noTasks
items.desc: A case that indicates the user has no tasks scheduled during the interval in which the task adherence was computed.

items.name: case noEvents
items.desc: A case that indicates the user has tasks scheduled, but there were no events during the interval in which adherence was computed.

items.name: case progress(Double)
items.desc: A case that indicates the amount of task adherence progress, with a double value between 0.0 and 1.0, where 1.0 represents 100 percent adherence.
